A '''poisonous polytra''' is a joke variant of the [[elytra]], added in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
=== Crafting ===
{{Crafting
|A1 = Phantom Membrane
|A2 = Phantom Membrane
|B1 = Poisonous Potato
|C1 = Phantom Membrane
|C2 = Phantom Membrane
|Output = Poisonous Polytra
|ignoreusage=1
}}

== Usage ==
{{main|Elytra#Usage}}
The [[control]]s, behavior, and features of the poisonous polytra are the same as the features of the elytra.
